summary: A teenager must battle for a gold charm to keep his family from being controlled by an evil leprechaun.
cast: Ryan Merriman|Henry Gibson|Alexis Lopez|Glenndon Chatman|Marita Geraghty|Paul Kiernan|Timothy Omundson|Dane Stevens|Charles Halford|Ashley Chapman|Brett Yoder|Emberson Bill|Thurl Bailey|Dustin Harding|Curley Green|Nora McCaa|John Kenneth Mergist|Stan Ellsworth|Trevor Wright|Sandra Shotwell|Tom Jacobson|Julie-Anne Liechty|Bronzell Miller|Julio Archiniega|Holly Alderman|Brooke Alderman|Billy Judkins|Bill McIntosh|Alisse Allen|Candace Allen|Christine Barlow|Blaine Bassett|Megan Burgin|Katie Donnelly|Scott Hanks|Marshall Hilliard|Deborah Johnson|Charisse Miller|Sydney Mohesian|Heather Newbold|Aaron Radl|Amanda Ruth|Sam Saletta|Kim Taylor|James Bereece|Elizabeth Miklavcic
title: Un golpe de suerte
